title: Ground News - Wife dreams she won lottery, then has husband buy a ticket. Prize leaves him ‘shaking’
text:
Summary by Star-Telegram “I thought about keeping it from my wife until she returns next week, but I couldn’t,” the Maryland winner said. Share menu 22 Articles 22 Articles All Left Center Right
